<background>
  <sky

<background>
  <sky material='Gazebo/CloudySky'

jrivero@nium worlds $ gazebo -e bullet pr2_stripped.world 
Warning [parser.cc:344] Converting a deprecated source[/home/jrivero/code/gazebo/test/worlds/pr2_stripped.world].
Warning [Converter.cc:59]   Version[1.0] to Version[1.5]
  Please use the gzsdf tool to update your SDF files.
    $ gzsdf convert [sdf_file]
Warning [Converter.cc:445] Deprecated SDF Values in original file:
<background>
  <sky

Warning [Converter.cc:445] Deprecated SDF Values in original file:
<background>
  <sky material='Gazebo/CloudySky'
